resolusi bawaan 2880 x 1864 pada 224 piksel per inci

Adaptor Daya Port USB-C Ganda 35 W
Kabel USB-C ke MagSafe 3

Pengisian Daya dan Ekspansi

Dua port Thunderbolt/USB 4 dengan dukungan untuk: Pengisian daya, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt 3 (hingga 40 Gb/dtk), USB 4 (hingga 40 Gb/dtk), USB 3.1 Gen 2 (hingga 10 Gb/dtk)

Deretan tiga mikrofon dengan pembentuk sinyal direksional
Jek headphone 3,5 mm dengan dukungan canggih untuk headphone impedansi tinggi

products.title: Apple Thunderbolt 4 (USB‑C) Pro Cable

reviews.message: Kayaknya khusus buat produk apple, saya colokin ke intel nuc gak konek, pas ke mac mini m1 langsung konek

products.description:
100% Original Apple

Overview
Featuring a black braided design that coils without tangling, this 1.8-meter cable supports Thunderbolt 3, Thunderbolt 4, and USB 4 data transfer up to 40Gb/s, USB 3 data transfer up to 10Gb/s, DisplayPort video output (HBR3), and charging up to 100W. Use this cable to connect a Mac with Thunderbolt 3 or 4 (USB-C) ports to Thunderbolt (USB-C) and USB displays and devices such as Studio Display, Pro Display XDR, docks, and hard drives. You can also use this cable to connect iPhone 15 Pro to Mac.

Highlights
Transfer data at up to 40Gb/s
USB 3.2 data transfer at up to 10Gb/s
DisplayPort video output (HBR3)
Connect to Thunderbolt (USB-C) and USB devices and displays
Up to 100 watts of power delivery
Braided design that coils without tangling
Active cable
Thunderbolt logo helps it stand out from other cables
Daisy-chain up to six Thunderbolt 3 devices

What’s in the Box
Apple Thunderbolt (USB-C) 4 Pro Cable (1.8 m)

Tech Specs
Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C)
